title: Old Movie Title Sequence
content:
"Presents" and "Distributed by" in the left image ... Is there any font that's close?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/caligari_4680.jpg)
author: avenir04

comments.content:
In the ballpark, Las Vegas Fabulous by House Industries:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LasVegasFabulous_5681.jpg)
  
 [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/lasvegasfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004518/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/lasvegasfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/lasvegasfonts")  
Don

Another in the ballpark, Lakeside by Mark Simonson  
---start quote---  
a flowing 1940s-style brush script, inspired by hand-lettered titles in Otto Preminger’s classic 1944 film noir movie “Laura”  
---end quote---

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Lakeside_3905.jpg)
  
 [http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/lakeside](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004518/http:/www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/lakeside "http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/lakeside")  
Don

Yet another in the ballpark, Kinescope by Mark Simonson  
---start quote---  
a dashing 1940s-style brush script, inspired by hand-lettered titles in Fleischer Brothers’ Superman cartoon series.  
---end quote---

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Kinescope_3903.jpg)
  
 [file:///K:/\_DHTWork9/ScriptsCasualConnected/Kinescope%20%E2%80%93%20Mark...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004518/http:/typophile.com/K:/_DHTWork9/ScriptsCasualConnected/Kinescope%20%E2%80%93%20Mark%20Simonson.htm "///K:/\_DHTWork9/ScriptsCasualConnected/Kinescope%20%E2%80%93%20Mark%20Simonson.htm")  
Don
